name: TaxRule
description: Tax application rules defining when and how a tax applies. Specifies conditions for tax applicability based on products, services, customer types, amounts, and locations.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: Priority order for tax rule evaluation (lower number = higher priority)

properties.name: applicableToProducts
properties.description: Whether this tax applies to physical products

properties.name: applicableToServices
properties.description: Whether this tax applies to services

properties.name: productCategories
properties.description: List of product categories this tax applies to (empty = all)

properties.name: customerTypes
properties.description: Customer types this tax applies to (B2C, B2B, government, etc.)

properties.name: minimumAmount
properties.description: Minimum transaction amount for tax to apply

properties.name: postalCodeFrom
properties.description: Starting postal code for range-based tax (US sales tax)

properties.name: postalCodeTo
properties.description: Ending postal code for range-based tax

properties.name: addressType
properties.description: Which address to use for tax determination
